verses.name: Philippians 1:11
verses.text: Being filled with the fruits of righteousness, which are by Jesus Christ, unto the glory and praise of God.

verses.name: Philippians 1:12
verses.text: But I would ye should understand, brethren, that the things which happened unto me have fallen out rather unto the furtherance of the gospel;

verses.name: Philippians 1:13
verses.text: So that my bonds in Christ are manifest in all the palace, and in all other places;

verses.name: Philippians 1:14
verses.text: And many of the brethren in the Lord, waxing confident by my bonds, are much more bold to speak the word without fear.

verses.name: Philippians 1:15
verses.text: Some indeed preach Christ even of envy and strife; and some also of good will:
